title: Aid the Underduke
content:
. (If Roah or Friol is still alive, you can side with Zhentarim and attack the Guild. Both Nine-Fingers and Zhentarim can be your allies in Gather Your Allies.)

How to unlock Aid the Underduke

Nine-Fingers, Guildhall
